column32: Scholarship's Information
column34: 2024-2025 cost of attendance after largest Merit Scholarship

column32: Presidential Award: Merit-based scholarship; students are automatically considered with their admission application. YouAreWelcomeHere Scholarship: Awarded to two first-year international students. Eligible students are contacted directly to complete a separate application.

The college's most competitive, full-tuition Merit Scholarship. Top first-year applicants are invited to compete. Focuses on academics, leadership, character, and personal achievement. Renewable for up to four years.

For out-of-state, first-time freshmen. Must be unconditionally admitted. Award based on a Composite Predictive Index (CPI) score calculated during admission. Renewable with a 2.80 GPA and completion of 30 credit hours per year.

Link directs to departmental awards. The main Merit Scholarships, such as the Distinguished Albion Scholarship, are awarded automatically upon admission based on the application file. No separate application is needed.

Awarded to students who balance academic excellence with leadership, co-curricular involvement, and community engagement. Consideration is automatic with the admission application. No separate scholarship application required.
The highest merit-based award. No separate application required; all applicants for admission are automatically considered based on academic performance and the rigor of their high school curriculum.

For high-achieving international students dedicated to positive civic and social change. Requires a separate application, bank letter, and English proficiency scores. Preference for those from diverse, underrepresented backgrounds.
A merit-based scholarship for degree-seeking international students on an F-1 or J-1 visa. Applicants are automatically considered upon admission; no separate scholarship application is needed.
The highest academic merit award. Students are automatically considered for this scholarship when they apply for admission. No separate application is required. Renewable for four years.

Awarded to international students based on a holistic review of their academic record (GPA) and English proficiency test scores. No separate application is required; students are automatically considered upon admission.
For non-resident students. Consideration is automatic for students who apply for admission by the deadline. Selection is based on high school GPA and standardized test scores (ACT/SAT).

For international undergraduate students. Freshmen are considered based on high school GPA or language test scores. Transfer students are considered based on their college GPA. No separate application needed.
The highest Merit Scholarship awarded to first-year students at the time of admission. No separate application is necessary. Renewable with a cumulative GPA of 3.0.
A top merit-based scholarship. Students are automatically considered with their application for admission. Selection is based on academic achievement, leadership, and service.
A four-year, full-tuition scholarship for international students. Admission is need-aware. Requires the CSS PROFILE for consideration. Aims to admit highly qualified candidates from around the world.
A merit-based scholarship for first-year undergraduate students. Students are automatically considered upon admission to the university. No separate application is required.

This appears to be the former name. The current top merit award for international students is the Global Distinction Scholarship. Students are automatically considered upon admission. Renewable with a 2.5 GPA.
An invitation-only event for high-achieving students who apply by the priority deadline. Attendees receive a scholarship. Selection is based on a holistic review of the admission application.
The highest Merit Scholarship offered. All applicants for admission are automatically considered. Based on exceptional scholastic achievement.

The President Scholarship is the most prestigious merit award. Students are automatically considered based on their admission application. No separate application needed. Selection is based on academic excellence.
Berea College provides 100% funding to all enrolled international students for the first year of enrollment. This combines financial aid and scholarships. A separate application is not required.
A competitive, premier scholarship program. Requires a separate application after being admitted to Berry. Finalists are invited to an on-campus competition.
This is an academic scholarship based on high school GPA. Students are automatically considered when they are admitted. No separate application is required.
Based on the provided PDF, this is the highest-tier academic scholarship. Awarded based on specific high school GPA and SAT/ACT scores. Automatic consideration with admission application.

The highest academic scholarship for incoming freshmen, based on GPA and test scores (if submitted). Students are automatically considered upon admission. Renewable based on maintaining a specific GPA.
A competitive, merit-based scholarship for new international undergraduate students. Requires a separate scholarship application, essays, and letters of recommendation.
A highly competitive, 15-person undergraduate Merit Scholarship program. Requires a separate application. Focuses on academic excellence, leadership, and community service.
BU's most prestigious Merit Scholarship. Requires a separate application with an additional essay. Awarded to students with exceptional academic credentials, leadership, and unique talents.

column30: Sidney A. Ribeau President's Leadership Academy
column32: A competitive scholarship for students with a passion for leadership and learning. Requires a separate application and an on-campus interview for finalists. Focuses on leadership experience and potential.
The most prestigious merit-based scholarship. Awarded to the highest-achieving new students. Automatic consideration based on the application for admission.

For international students with strong academic records and a history of leadership. Requires a separate application, including a nomination form and essays. Focuses on students who will contribute to the campus community.

The most prestigious scholarship for entering freshmen. All students who complete the general scholarship application are considered. Selection is based on academic excellence, leadership, and service.
Merit-based scholarships, including the top-tier President Scholarship, are awarded based on the admission application. No separate application is needed. Awards are based on academic achievement.

A research-focused program for top students. Students receive a stipend for a summer research project with a faculty mentor. Automatic consideration for top applicants; no separate application required.

International students are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships upon admission. Awards are based on the strength of the application, including academic performance. No separate application required.

column1: Cal Poly-San Luis Obispo (Cal. Polytech. State

column32: A scholarship for newly admitted international undergraduate students. Requires a separate application process, including an essay. Awarded based on academic merit.
The highest merit-based academic scholarship. Students are automatically considered when they apply for admission. Based on unweighted GPA and test scores (if provided). Renewable.

Provides comprehensive financial support for talented students from Asia. Applicants must demonstrate exceptional academic and personal promise. A separate application is not required but students must indicate interest.
A competitive, full-tuition scholarship. Requires a separate application, essay, and an on-campus competition for finalists. Focuses on academics, leadership, and service.
Offers various competitive scholarships, including some full-tuition awards. Requires a separate application and participation in a scholarship competition weekend for finalists.

column30: Socratic, Spirit of Catawba, Hobgood Scholarships
column32: These are part of the Catawba College Scholars Program. Requires nomination (self-nomination is accepted) and a separate application. Finalists are invited to compete on campus.

This appears to be primarily for domestic students. International students are considered for the International President's Award, a merit-based scholarship, upon admission. No separate application needed.
A range of scholarships are available for new and continuing international students. Requires a separate general scholarship application through the university's scholarship portal.
A premier scholarship program for students who demonstrate high academic achievement and leadership. Automatic consideration for top applicants; selected students are invited to apply.
All undergraduate applicants, including international students, are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships based on their admission application. No separate application is required.

column30: Presidential Scholarship and Rachel Carson Scholarship
column32: Both are competitive, full-tuition scholarships. A separate application is required for each, and finalists must attend a Scholarship Interview Day. Open to first-year international students.

column30: Seaver Scholars and Interdisciplinary Science Scholars
column32: These are merit-based scholarship programs for students with exceptional academic and leadership potential. No separate application is required; candidates are selected from the pool of regular decision applicants.

One of Clark's most prestigious scholarships. No separate application required; students are selected based on the strength of their admission application. Focuses on students who will be leaders at Clark and beyond.
The highest merit award for international students. Awarded automatically based on academic criteria (GPA and test scores) from the admission application. No separate application is needed.
The top Merit Scholarship awarded to first-year students. Students are automatically considered based on their application for admission.
All applicants are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships, such as the Founder's Scholarship, based on their academic record. No separate application is necessary.

A select group of about 100 freshmen are invited to the program. Selection is based on the admission application. Scholars receive a research grant and special advising. No separate application required.

All applicants are automatically considered for merit awards (President's and Provost's Scholarships) based on the admission application. Other competitive scholarships like the Harvey Scholarship require the General Scholarship Application.
International students are automatically considered for merit-based awards like the Green and Gold Scholarship based on their application for admission; no separate application is needed.

The "CC Excellence Scholarship" is not explicitly named. However, the university offers a range of merit-based scholarships to international students. Consideration is automatic upon admission. No separate application is needed.
The Founders Scholarship is a premier merit-based scholarship. Students are automatically considered when they apply for admission. No separate application is required.

column1: Cooper Union for Adv. of Sci. & Art
column32: All admitted undergraduate students receive a half-tuition scholarship. Financial aid is need-based to cover remaining costs. The award is automatic with admission.
This is a need-based scholarship for undergraduate students from India. Applicants must apply for financial aid along with their admission application to be considered.

Scott Scholarship: For business majors; requires US Citizenship. Next Generation Leaders: Full-tuition award for domestic and international students. Requires a separate application by January 10 after submitting the admission application.

column30: William Holt Terry Scholarship and Berk Scholarship
column32: These are nomination-based scholarships. Students must be nominated by their Head of School or Counselor. They cannot self-apply. Finalists are chosen from the nominee pool.

All applicants, including international students, are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships ranging up to full tuition. No separate application is required. Awards are announced at the time of admission.
All first-year applicants are automatically considered for Merit Scholarships based on academic achievement in their admission application.
The Rector Scholarship is DePauw's oldest and most prestigious merit award. All applicants are automatically considered with their admission application. No separate application is needed.
This is a competitive, full-tuition scholarship. Requires a separate application, essay, and resume by December 1.
A merit-based scholarship awarded to a select group of the most outstanding applicants. Consideration is automatic with the admission application. No separate scholarship application is required.
All full-time, first-year students admitted directly from high school automatically receive a Presidential Scholarship based on academic achievement. No separate application is needed.
This scholarship is for students admitted to the Baldwin Honors Program. Consideration for the program (and associated scholarship) is automatic for all applicants who apply by the priority deadline.
A competitive, full-tuition scholarship for a select number of international students. Applicants must submit a separate application and essay.

Karsh: Fully funded scholarship for international students with demonstrated financial need. No separate application; apply for admission and financial aid. Robertson: Separate, extensive application process. Leadership-focused program for students at Duke and UNC-Chapel Hill.
All first-year applicants are automatically considered for academic scholarships at the time of admission based on their academic record. No separate application is required.
earlham's most prestigious merit-based scholarship. International applicants are automatically considered when they apply for admission by the deadline.
This is for international students majoring in a STEM field. Requires a separate application. Focuses on students who will be active in community outreach.
This scholarship is for continuing international students, not new students. It requires demonstrating service to the university community and maintaining a high GPA.
This is not a scholarship but a program that offers international undergraduate students a tuition rate that is significantly lower than the standard non-resident rate. It is automatically applied.
Awarded to eligible international students based on demonstrated financial need. Students must complete the Eckerd College Application for Financial Aid for International Students to be considered.

This is a state legislative program, not a scholarship, that dramatically reduces tuition costs for all undergraduate students, including international students, at select North Carolina universities. It is applied automatically.
All international applicants are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships. No separate application is required. Awards are based on the strength of the admission application.
The highest Merit Scholarship offered. All first-year students are automatically considered upon admission. No separate application is required.
Awarded to select international students based on academic merit and country of origin. No separate application is required; consideration is automatic with the admission application.
This link is for general financial information. Merit-based scholarships are automatically considered for all applicants based on their academic achievements. No separate application is needed.

Emory offers need-based aid and merit-based scholarships to international students. To be considered for merit awards like the Woodruff Scholarship, students must select one of the scholar programs on their application and submit required essays.
All admitted international undergraduate students are considered for a merit-based scholarship. No separate application is required; consideration is automatic with the admission application.
A state legislative program that significantly reduces tuition for all undergraduate students, including international students. This is an automatic tuition reduction, not a competitive scholarship.
The top Merit Scholarship for new international students. Consideration is automatic for students who have been admitted by a specific deadline. Based on cumulative high school GPA.

The link is broken/outdated. General FAU scholarship information indicates that international students are eligible for some Merit Scholarships, and consideration is typically based on the admission application.
FGCU offers a limited number of merit-based scholarships and tuition waivers for international students. A separate application through their scholarship portal is generally required.
This is a merit-based scholarship for all new first-year students, including international students. Consideration is automatic upon acceptance to the university.
This is a premier scholarship for high-achieving first-year students. It is highly competitive. International students are eligible to apply through the general scholarship application portal.
An elite, merit-based scholarship program. Requires a separate application after submitting the FSU application. Focuses on academic excellence, leadership, creativity, and service.

Fordham's most prestigious scholarship. Open to the top 1% of admitted students. Finalists are invited to an interview. Consideration is automatic for all admission applicants; no separate application is needed.
All applicants for admission are automatically considered for all of F&M's merit-based scholarships. No separate application is required.

column1: Franklin W. Olin College of Engineering
column32: All admitted students receive a significant merit-based scholarship that covers half the tuition. The award is automatic with admission.

All applicants are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships (such as the President's, Provost's, and Dean's scholarships) upon admission. No separate application is necessary.
This is a renewable scholarship for first-year international students. It requires a separate application, including an essay or video, after being admitted to GMU.
A scholarship for international students dedicated to advancing intercultural learning. Requires a separate scholarship application to be submitted after the admission application.
Georgia Tech's most prestigious scholarship program. early Action applicants are prioritized for consideration. No separate application is needed; candidates are identified from the applicant pool.
A merit-based scholarship awarded to a limited number of new international students. No separate application needed; consideration is automatic with a completed admission application.
GSU's most prestigious scholarships, administered through the Honors College. Requires an application to the Honors College by the deadline. Open to all first-year applicants.

Gettysburg's most selective merit award for students with exceptional records in academics and community engagement. No separate application is required; consideration is automatic for all first-year applicants.
All applicants are automatically considered for Merit Scholarships based on the strength of their admission application. No separate form is needed.

All international applicants are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships. No separate application is required. Decisions are based on the strength of the admission application materials.
A premier scholarship program for high-achieving students. Requires a separate application after being admitted. Finalists must participate in an interview.
One of Guilford's top Merit Scholarships. All applicants for admission are automatically considered. No separate application is necessary.
The college's most prestigious academic scholarship. Students must first be admitted to the college to be considered. Top applicants are invited to apply.
A premier Merit Scholarship. A separate application is required, including an essay and recommendation letter. Focuses on academic excellence and leadership.

This scholarship is for students in the dual-degree engineering program. Other Merit Scholarships are awarded automatically based on the admission application. No separate application is required for general merit awards.

column30: Harvey S. Mudd and Esterbrook scholarships
column32: These are merit-based scholarships awarded to a select number of students. No separate application is required; recipients are selected based on their outstanding admission applications.
A scholarship for incoming international students. Requires a separate application, including an essay, to be submitted after receiving an offer of admission.
All applicants are automatically considered for merit-based academic scholarships upon admission. No separate application is required.
A student's application for admission is also their application for merit-based scholarships. No separate application is required. Awards are based on academic achievement.
The college offers hundreds of privately funded scholarships based on academic merit, leadership, and other talents. Consideration is automatic with the admission application.
Admitted international students are Automatically Awardarded the Global Scholarship. No separate application is required. The award is renewable for four years.

All applicants are automatically considered for Merit Scholarships (e.g., Trustee, Blackwell) at the time of admission. Some specific awards, like the Centennial Center Leadership Scholarship, require a separate application after admission.
The Presidential Scholarship is the highest merit award. All first-year applicants are automatically considered based on their admission application. No separate application is needed.

All international applicants are automatically considered for a merit-based scholarship upon admission. The primary considerations are academic performance, personal statement, activities, and leadership.

A limited number of tuition waivers that reduce tuition to the in-state rate are available for international students. Awarded on a competitive, first-come, first-served basis, typically requiring a high GPA (3.5+).

column30: M. A. and Lila Self Leadership Academy Scholarship
column32: This is a premier scholarship program. Students are automatically reviewed for most institutional scholarships, including this one, upon application. Some top awards, like the Camras Scholarship, may require an interview.

The university offers various scholarships for international students. New students are automatically considered for the International Student Merit Scholarship upon admission based on GPA. No separate application required.
Two full-tuition scholarships are awarded to highly qualified first-year international students. Consideration is automatic with the admission application.
This is the premier scholarship for out-of-state students. Requires a separate application, and finalists must attend an on-campus interview. Open to international students.

A prestigious full-cost-of-attendance scholarship. International students must be nominated by their high school. Students can also be considered for nomination by the Office of International Services after applying for admission.
This is the highest merit-based scholarship. Students are automatically considered with their application for admission. No separate scholarship application is necessary.

column30: International Merit Scholarship Award of Achievement
column32: The top tier of international merit awards. Requires completing the Oneapp scholarship application after being admitted. Selection is competitive and based on a holistic review of academics and test scores.

A specific scholarship for students with a demonstrated record of leadership. Requires a separate application in addition to the admission application. Other Merit Scholarships are awarded automatically.
The premier scholarship covering full costs. Requires a high GPA and ACT/SAT score. Consideration is automatic with the admission application.
All admitted first-year international students are Automatically Awardarded a Merit Scholarship upon acceptance. The amount is determined by the Office of Admissions based on academic performance.
A scholarship for students from Virginia who have overcome adversity. This scholarship is not intended for international students.
The premier merit-based scholarship. All applicants are automatically considered upon admission. No separate application is required.

column32: A full-tuition Merit Scholarship for up to two undergraduate engineering students. No separate application is needed; consideration is automatic for all first-year engineering applicants.
This is a top merit-based scholarship for international students. Consideration is automatic when an international student applies for admission. No separate application is required.
The premier Merit Scholarship. Awarded to top applicants based on their admission application. No separate application is required. Finalists are invited to a scholarship competition.
An award for international undergraduate students with high academic standing. Requires a separate application through the university's scholarship portal.
The provided link is for graduate students in a specific college. General university scholarships for undergraduates may be available through the university's scholarship portal.
Awarded automatically to eligible new international freshmen based on their cumulative high school GPA. No separate scholarship application is required.
These are premier merit-based scholarships. All students who apply for admission are automatically considered. No separate application is needed.
All admitted students, including international students, are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships based on their high school GPA. No separate application is needed.

The link refers to an International Student Tuition Waiver, which is different. The Honors Scholarship is the top merit award and requires an application to the Honors Program.

A renewable scholarship for international freshmen. Requires a separate application in addition to the admission application, demonstrating interest and initiative in promoting intercultural learning.

The Marquis Fellowship is a full-tuition award, and the Marquis Scholarship is a half-tuition award. Both are renewable for up to eight semesters, provided the student maintains a 3.00 GPA. Selection is based on the academic record and personal qualities that honor the Marquis de Lafayette. No separate application required; all applicants are automatically considered upon admission. An interview is encouraged.
All international applicants are automatically considered for merit-based scholarships at the time of admission. No separate application is required.

The university's most prestigious scholarship. Selection is by invitation only. Students are selected from the highest-achieving applicants for admission.

All applicants are automatically considered for Merit Scholarships, such as the Founder's Scholarship and Dean's Scholars. No separate application is needed.

Includes several full-ride scholarships. Requires a separate application and participation in a Scholars Weekend for finalists. Open to high-achieving first-year applicants.

Awarded to new international students who meet specific GPA requirements. Consideration is automatic upon admission. No separate application is needed.
